description: THE drift car. The Pacific Drift is rear-wheel drive with a bulletproof chassis that was practically designed to go sideways. Stock power is modest, but the aftermarket support is legendary â€” there are more bolt-on options for this car than any other vehicle in Nova Pacifica.
lore: If you've been to any drift event in Nova Pacifica, you've seen a Pacific Drift. Probably twenty of them. The aftermarket for these is so deep you could build ten completely different cars from the same platform. Stock, it's a canvas. Built, it's a masterpiece.
